20110104233447.000|20110104233449.000|CC1|HE SAID THEY ARE CAUSING CHAOS

20110104233454.000|20110104233457.000|CC1|THE NEW SHOW KIM AND KOURTNEY   
20110104233457.000|20110104233457.000|CC1|TAKE NEW YORK.                  
20110104233457.000|20110104233459.000|CC1|>> I COME INTO A NEIGHBORHOOD,  
20110104233459.000|20110104233502.000|CC1|COME INTO A NEIGHBORHOOD AND

20110104233622.000|20110104233623.000|CC1|>> JUST BECAUSE SOME FOLKS MIGHT
20110104233623.000|20110104233624.000|CC1|KNOW WHO I AM, OKAY.

20110104233643.000|20110104233644.000|CC1|WHAT IS BEING CALLED AN

20110104233657.000|20110104233657.000|CC1|SERVES AS A BACK SCRATCHER.     
20110104233657.000|20110104233658.000|CC1|>> NO WAY I CAN TAKE A 9:00 TO  
20110104233658.000|20110104233702.000|CC1|5:00 JOB.

20110104233703.000|20110104233707.000|CC1|THEIR MOTHER AT THEIR HOUSE

20110104233712.000|20110104233717.000|CC1|IT'S WHAT THEY WANT TO DO.      
20110104233717.000|20110104233717.000|CC1|I'M THERE TO SUPPORT THEM IN

20110104233732.000|20110104233733.000|CC1|ABOUT 20 BUCKS APIECE.
